summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4047 for the improvement of Court Street from Rainier Avenue to a point 430 feet west thereof; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48862, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
